title: Body Heat
description: Tough and sexy arson investigator Zach Chapin was furious when he was called off his current case to baby-sit Rebecca Fox, a would be actress researching the role of a lifetime. But passion soon ignited between them, making their days together a simmering prelude to their white hot nights. Yet when an arsonist personally called Zach to gloat about his latest fire, Zach was soon back on the job - with Rebecca close behind. And now with no time for mistakes, Zach must catch a dangerous criminal, and protect the woman who has managed to light the fire in his soul...
author: Elise Title
